verbose_text: Interestingly, as previously reported for human B cells in vitro [XREF_BIBR] CD40 costimulation by T cells led to enhanced B cell OPG production in mice in vivo, further defining an important role for T cell mediated regulation of B cell OPG.
evidence: CD40 costimulation by T cells led to enhanced B cell OPG production in mice in vivo, further defining an important role for T cell-mediated regulation of B cell OPG
